metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3081 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 25.0.0.171 and earlier have an exploitable use after free vulnerability during internal computation caused by multiple display object mask manipulations. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3081` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1').
